Career Profile

Experienced Product Manager with a demonstrated history of working in the sports, media, and tech industries. Strong Product professional, currently studying advanced software engineering at Hack Reactor. Skilled in Digital Strategy, User Experience, Team Management, and Full Stack Development.

Professional Experience

Product Manager

2015 - 2017
Krossover Intelligence, NYC

  • Managed team of 15 developers, visual & UX designers, and QA engineers

  • Created user testing suite for connecting, recording, and storing sessions
  • Presented slide decks of insight and strategy to management and company at large

2009 - 2015
Sanborn Agency, NYC
